scripts.test:db: DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_TEST NODE_ENV=test pnpm --filter @plumbing/db exec prisma migrate deploy && DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_TEST NODE_ENV=test pnpm --filter @plumbing/web test:db
scripts.postinstall: if [ -z "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then echo "Skipping prisma generate (no DATABASE_URL)"; else pnpm --filter @plumbing/db run prisma:generate; fi
scripts.db:reset: docker compose -f infra/docker/compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f infra/docker/compose.yml up -d
